tool_description: The Real-time Parking Occupancy API provides up-to-date information on the current availability of parking spaces in a specific parking facility. This API enables users to access data regarding the number of occupied and vacant parking spaces, allowing for efficient management and utilization of parking resources. Whether you're a driver searching for an available spot or a parking facility manager optimizing space allocation, this API serves as a valuable tool to enhance parking convenience ...
name: Real-time Parking Occupancy
title: Real-time Parking Occupancy

api_list.name: GET Map Parkings
api_list.description: This API endpoint, is designed to provide users with a list of markers that are currently visible within the displayed map area. It allows developers to retrieve information about markers, such as their coordinates, names, and additional details, ensuring that users have access to relevant and contextual data when interacting with a map. This feature enhances the user experience by simplifying the process of locating and accessing information about points of interest within the map's visible area.
